Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
17.01.2013 SH SCR17867 Set PI.BACKUP_FILES to False if GSET_NUMBEROFDAYS(363) <> 1
-- Used for testing purposes
... get temp directory (used for file manipulation)
... get backup directory (used to store original file)
.. in case only BOM has to be removed, file encoding is not relevant
... save original file
... move file to temp directory
... copy file back to source directory. temp file is deleted conditionally
... message to joblog and turn job to MSGW
... display message
.. determine temporary file name for futher handling (sequence number to prevent problems with same file names)
-- Encoding from
-- First check the encoding of the file, if it's already UTF-8 then converison is skipped
... else in case of calling program instructs to use a specific encoding
... else use encoding defined for the client
... else use the business unit encoding
-- Encoding to
... in case of calling program instructs to use a specific encoding
... else use the FL default encoding
-- Encoding from
... in case of calling program instructs to use a specific encoding
-- Encoding to
... in case of calling program instructs to use a specific encoding
... else use encoding defined for the client
... else use the business unit encoding
-- Remove BOM
-- Add BOM
.. in case of directory does not exists --> error
-- Copy file
... copy file falied
-- Delete source file if copy was successfull (only if file has to be moved)
... delete source file falied
